name: Aviatech Potchefstroom (Pty) Ltd
about: Aviatech Flight Academy, located in Potchefstroom, is a registered and accredited flight school dedicated to providing the highest standards in aviation training. With a team of experienced instructors, including CFIs and designated examiners, we offer comprehensive training programs for Private Pilots License (PPL), Commercial Pilots License (CPL), and Airline Transport Pilots License (ATPL). Our training is conducted on reliable Cessna aircraft, ensuring students receive hands-on experience with well-equipped instruments. We also feature an authorized SACAA exam center for convenience. Our air-conditioned classrooms host ground schools and briefings, and we welcome international students. Aviatech Flight Academy is committed to guiding and supporting students to achieve their aviation goals.
services:
["Private Pilot License
PPL to Commercial Pilot License
Night / Instrument / Multi - Engine Rating
National Pilot License
Touring Motor Glider License"]
